channel.title: Project Kantas
channel.description:
[img]http://i1153.photobucket.com/albums/p506/projectkantas/Trolololololollollololokl.png[/img] Project Kantas is a Deltascape-based server that I have started, I am in need of certain people to help me make this server as enjoyable as possible. I am not in need of any coders to start off with, but may need some later on. There are three method of applying, which are Skype: ProjectKantas Email: [email]ProjectKantas@yahoo.com[/email] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=189567]PM on Moparscape[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;topic=542159.0;]Message on this topic[/url] Note: Only the things in [b]bold[/b] are required [I][b]Beta Tester[/b][/i]
Name(user or IRL): [b]What days you are usually available: How good are you(1-10) at finding glitches or bugs:[/b]
[I][b]Forum developer[/b][/i]
Name(User or IRL): [B]How long have you made websites, or forums[/b] [B]Any proof of your work:[/b] [B]Must have server logo(top of this topic) on the forums, unless you have a better one[/b]
[i][b]Server artist[/b][/i]
Name(User or IRL): [B]How good are you at making images(1-10): Any proof of your work:[/b]
[b][font=comic sans ms]Beta tester(s)(0 / 5) Forum developer(s)(0 / 3) Server artist(s) (1 / 2) Kronixz [/font][/b] But mostly I need ideas, feel free to post any suggestion for this server, and I will consider all of them; Everyone's ideas are appreciated.

item.title: Project Kantas
item.dc:creator: @BabyMaker BabyMaker
item.description:
@BabyMaker wrote:

I have been making forums now for around a year and a half. I have the most experience in IPB. I worked with MyBB for around 3 months then upgraded to IPB so that gives you my time frame.
I do not have proof because I have taken my site offline but i do have all the files on my computer to show you i used to work with the things I am talking about.

Putting your logo at the top of the forums is probably the easiest thing to do so that will not be a problem! I have a lot to add to the server via the forums. I am in a rush so this is not vry detailed but please get back to me. I have skyped you as well. Modz4Modz4

Read full topic

[quote=“nolan2131, post:23, topic:439465”]Name(user or IRL): Nolan

How good are you(1-10) at finding glitches or bugs: 8 or 9, I try every aspect of any sever when I play it giving me a pretty good chance. [/quote]
Accepted, once we get into beta, you’ll get the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Kantas
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

That’s absolutely fine. I could get you a mybb or smf installed easily and then start working on a homepage.

If your interested just lemme know in pm the details of host information. (webhost information ) Unless your hosting site via vps

Read full topic

item.title: Project Kantas
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:15, topic:439465”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=542159.msg3973896#msg3973896 date=1334439739]

Status update on forum developer/website developer application review?

I’ll let you know if you tell me what this is all about

[quote]Note: if you want vb/ipb software you will have to supply the license etc I do NOT use nulled scripts/warez. You will also have to supply your own webhost. I do NOT work with free hosts.
[/quote]
[/quote]vb (vbulletin forums ), ipb (invision power boards ) are forums that require validation via a license code.

There are people out there who “crack” or “null” these forum softwares with a false validator. I do not and refuse to use nulled software. That is all I was saying. The reason I do not use nulled software is that it can get the host to suspend your account ( which would pretty much wipe any previous work you have done ) etc.[/quote]
Well, I would like you to choose any free one, because as of now I have no funds to spend on server.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Kantas
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Basic2733, post:14, topic:439465”]WOW kronixz, you fucking fail using my work and saying it yours the best one on there is the one i made the badge on saying optimus scape founder you fucking noob get your own skill

p.s. i got prof if you want i got the psd file still saved as i made it!!![/quote]
your work? you only had the .psd becuase u wanted to edit them… dude stop looking attention.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Kantas
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:13, topic:439465”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=542159.msg3973889#msg3973889 date=1334439335]
Status update on forum developer/website developer application review?
[/quote]
I’ll let you know if you tell me what this is all about

[quote]Note: if you want vb/ipb software you will have to supply the license etc I do NOT use nulled scripts/warez. You will also have to supply your own webhost. I do NOT work with free hosts.
[/quote][/quote]vb (vbulletin forums ), ipb (invision power boards ) are forums that require validation via a license code.

There are people out there who “crack” or “null” these forum softwares with a false validator. I do not and refuse to use nulled software. That is all I was saying. The reason I do not use nulled software is that it can get the host to suspend your account ( which would pretty much wipe any previous work you have done ) etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Kantas
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

How long have you made websites, or forums:

smf - almost three years
vb - going on two years in a few months
ipb - 0 experience
mybb/phpbb - about three months
html - about a year
php - four-five months
sql database integration with php etc - two months
other ( asp/.net/etc ) - just doodled around with this type of stuff nothing major so about a month worth of messing around

Any proof of your work:

I can provide vouches upon request or you can view my community forums… but you will have to add my msn for information as its censored on here <3

Must have server logo(top of this topic) on the forums, unless you have a better one

easy

Note: if you want vb/ipb software you will have to supply the license etc I do NOT use nulled scripts/warez. You will also have to supply your own webhost. I do NOT work with free hosts.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Kantas
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Trolololololollollololokl.png990×177

Project Kantas is a Deltascape-based server that I have started, I am in need of certain people to help me make this server as enjoyable as possible. I am not in need of any coders to start off with, but may need some later on.

There are three method of applying, which are

Skype: ProjectKantas
Email: ProjectKantas@yahoo.com
PM on Moparscape
Message on this topic

Note: Only the things in bold are required

Beta Tester

Name(user or IRL): [b]What days you are usually available: How good are you(1-10) at finding glitches or bugs:[/b]

Forum developer

Name(User or IRL): [B]How long have you made websites, or forums[/b] [B]Any proof of your work:[/b] [B]Must have server logo(top of this topic) on the forums, unless you have a better one[/b]

Server artist

Name(User or IRL): [B]How good are you at making images(1-10): Any proof of your work:[/b]
[b][font=comic sans ms]Beta tester(s)(0 / 5)

Forum developer(s)(0 / 3)

Server artist(s) (1 / 2)
Kronixz

[/font][/b]
But mostly I need ideas, feel free to post any suggestion for this server, and I will consider all of them; Everyone’s ideas are appreciated.

Read full topic
